verses.roman:
'vāsudevoddhāra' ei kahila ākhyāna
'vāsudevāmṛta-prada' haila prabhura nāma

synonyms: vāsudeva-uddhāra—giving liberation to Vāsudeva; ei—this; kahila—is described; ākhyāna—narration; vāsudeva-amṛta-prada—the giver of nectar to Vāsudeva; haila—became; prabhura nāma—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu's holy name.
translation: Thus I have described how Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu reclaimed the leper Vāsudeva and so received the name Vāsudevāmṛta-prada.
